The claim was made based on a six: second video tweeted by President Donald Trump's campaign, which showed Joe Biden saying, "Why am I doing this? Why? What is my real aim?"
The expert: s verdict clarified that Biden was actually quoting something from Pope Francis during a campaign stop in Warm Springs, Georgia, on October 27, 2020, and not expressing confusion about his own campaign.
